sub_title: Passionate People Developer and Strategic Fintech Leader | Chartered Accountant
summary:
First and foremost to any role I take on is my Passion for people development 🤝, I thrive on empowering individuals and teams to reach their full potential. With a strategic mindset 🚀 and a keen understanding of organizational dynamics, I strive to create an environment that fosters collaboration, innovation, and continuous growth.

With a background more recently in Fintech and Finance 💼, I bring a unique blend of industry knowledge and expertise to drive success. I have successfully navigated the complexities of the financial technology landscape, leveraging technology solutions to enhance financial operations and deliver exceptional customer experiences.

With a focus on building strong relationships and fostering collaboration, I cultivate a culture of trust, transparency, and open communication. I understand the nuances of what it takes to take a company from start-up to scale-up to established. Through this experience I developed a passion beyond the finance world and one that is focused on Tech and the SaaS world.

Driven by a desire for continuous learning and improvement, I actively seek opportunities to stay ahead of emerging trends. I embrace innovation and enjoy exploring new technologies and methodologies to drive business transformation and improve financial outcomes.

If you're looking for a dedicated, high-performing professional with a deep passion for fintech, SaaS companies, I would love to connect. Let's collaborate and make a positive impact together. 👥✨💡📈

It is the worlds largest open water event.

contributors.headline: Passionate People Developer and Strategic Fintech Leader | Chartered Accountant

profile_positions.description: The Manager of Client and Partner Services is responsible for the day to day management of the Customer Journey team within the EMEA region, with specific focus on the delivery of Workiva's platform and Partner Enablement and Development. I directly manage a team of Implementation Consultants and Integration Consultants based in Amsterdam, Paris, London and Frankfurt.
profile_positions.title: Manager - Client & Partner Services | Financial Reporting & ESG

profile_positions.description: The Solutions Manager is responsible for executing cross-functional go-to-market plans for both established and emerging Workiva solutions and ensuring the plans achieve business objectives. The Solutions Manager coordinates the plans and ensures that risks and deliverables are identified, integrated and managed successfully to achieve long term growth. The Solutions Manager also sets, tracks and monitors key performance metrics of assigned go-to-market programs.
profile_positions.title: EMEA Solutions Manager | Management Reporting

profile_positions.description:
Workiva, provider of the world’s leading connected reporting and compliance platform, is used by thousands of enterprises across 180 countries, including more than 75 percent of Fortune 500® companies, and by government agencies. Our customers have linked over five billion data elements to trust their data, reduce risk and save time. For more information about Workiva (NYSE:WK), please visit workiva.com.

The Solutions Architect directly interfaces with potential customers to listen and gather customer requirements for needed services. Working closely with customers and internal teams from Sales, Product Development, and Customer Success, the Solutions Architect develops solutions within current Workiva products to meet customer needs.

Responsibilities
Solutions Development: The Solutions Architect interacts with customers to determine their needs and develops solutions with current Workiva products to meet those needs
Conducts discovery phase to determine customer challenges and requirements
Creating custom demo solutions for prospective customers
Directly interfacing with customers and demonstrates complex solutions
Collecting feedback from the field and provides it to Product Marketing and Product Development
Demonstrating a strong knowledge of Workiva products through a commitment to ongoing training
Serve as the technical platform expert on Workiva products to customers

Skills
Master of Workiva applications
Proven problem solving skills and business acumen
Ability to thrive in a dynamic, fast-paced environment, successfully multi-tasking and determining priorities to meet deadlines
Detail-oriented and organized
Self-motivated to work autonomously
Strong presentation skills
profile_positions.title: Financial Solutions Architect (Implementation Consultant)

profile_positions.description:
Responsibilities include: 
- Managing teams as the auditor in charge.
- Performing detailed risk assessment procedures on audit clients
- Identifying significant risks and creating responsive procedures.
- Identifying and testing internal controls (Design, implementation and operating effectiveness)
- Obtaining a detailed understanding of the client's business, industry & processes.
- Coordinating client deliverables from various departments within the Firm.
- Managing deadlines.
- Drafting reports to management, those charged with governance and audit committees
- Detail testing of client’s financial statements
- Providing guidance and coaching to audit teams
profile_positions.title: Junior Manager

profile_positions.description: Elected as the Vice-Chairman of the Siyakhula Community Initiative. Siyakhula is a tutoring program providing accounting and maths lessons to students currently in grade 10, 11 and 12. We also assist with university and bursary applications to help students in accessing tertiary institutions.
profile_positions.title: Vice Chairman: Deloitte - Siyakhula

profile_positions.description: The purpose of  the Employment Equity Act, No 55 of 1998 is to achieve equality in the workplace by promoting equal opportunity and fair treatment in employment through elimination of unfair discrimination, in order to ensure equitable representation in all occupational categories and levels in the workforce.
profile_positions.title: Vice Chairman: Deloitte - Employment Equity Forum

profile_positions.description:

- Performing detailed risk assessment procedures on audit clients
- Identifying significant risks and creating responsive procedures.
- Identifying and testing internal controls (Design, implementation and operating effectiveness)
- Obtaining a detailed understanding of the client's business, industry & processes.
- Coordinating client deliverables from various departments within the Firm.
- Managing deadlines.
- Drafting reports to management, those charged with governance and audit committees
- Detail testing of client’s financial statements
- Providing guidance and coaching to audit teams
profile_positions.title: Senior Auditor (Auditor in Charge)

profile_positions.description: Providing academic assistance to the accounting department of the University of Stellenbosch, in the form of marking assignments and tests.
